title: Wags at War round 2: the men get involved which is never a good sign. Here's why
text:
You will, by now, be fully across the globe-trembling news of the bitter dispute between footballers’ wives Coleen “Mrs Wayne” Rooney and Rebekah “Mrs Jamie” Vardy. You will have doubtless picked sides, formed a nuanced opinion and “taken to the internet” to express it. Truly, this is the Montagues vs Capulets of low-rent celebrity gossip. The Brexit it’s OK to discuss at dinner parties.

Just to recap, last week Coleen posted a statement online explaining how she’d realised that someone close to her had been leaking stories about she and Wayne’s gilded lifestyle to The Sun. To smoke out the treacherous culprit, she spent five months strategically narrowing down the field by telling false tales...
description: You will, by now, be fully across the globe-trembling news of the bitter dispute between footballers’ wives Coleen “Mrs Wayne” Rooney and Rebekah “Mrs Jamie” Vardy.
